item.description: “DOU’DOU å…œå…œæ·˜æ¢¦” – An Experimental New Media Project. [ According to the fixed point trajectory, the robotic arm carries out the media projection like a chasing light in the space, connecting multiple fragmented dream segments by the interaction between light & shadow with space. Through constructing the “Escape plan” of “a self-conscious shadow” in our sleep to metaphorize that the past which makes us want to escape is actually a part of our own heart, and we have the ability to face our inner self. ] Â· Background Story Â· During the Production – Video Presentation <!DOCTYPE HTML>
